physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a straight road. There are roofed buildings on the right and left hand side of the road. Two cars can be seen and people are walking on the road as well. Trees can be seen in the background of the photograph.
title_text: Village near Kota Tinggi Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Kota Tinggi (Johor, Malaysia) Villages
